footer_tagline: Empowering the future of digital assets through education and transparent project showcasing.
footer_disclaimer: Colestia is an educational portal and does not facilitate token sales. All investments are handled by licensed third-party portals.
about_title_1: Colestia: A Space for the New Generation Believing in Thai Cinema
about_desc_1: We believe great films aren't built by a few, but grow from the collective passion of everyone. Here, creators don't carry dreams alone, and audiences aren't just spectators.
about_title_2: Every Idea Deserves a Stage. Everyone Deserves a Role.
about_desc_2: Colestia bridges creators and film lovers. A space where ideas become reality, where the new generation tries, grows, and sees their work go further. We turn viewing into participation, driving Thai cinema forward together.
about_desc_3: This isn't just a platform. It's the start of a new chapter for Thai cinema. A chapter we write together.
home_we_are_subtitle_1: is a space for the new generation who believe in the power of Thai cinema
home_we_are_desc_1: We believe great films aren't built by a few, but grow from the collective passion of everyone. Here, creators don't carry dreams alone, and audiences aren't just spectators. Every idea deserves a stage. Everyone who loves film deserves a part in its creation.
home_we_are_subtitle_2: values every origin of every idea
home_we_are_desc_2: We prioritize the rights and ownership of creators clearly. Every idea, every work remains truly with those who created it. Colestia serves as a supportive and connecting space, respecting the value and copyright of every idea.
home_we_are_subtitle_3: is the bridge between creators and Thai film lovers
home_we_are_desc_3: A space where ideas become reality, where the new generation tries, grows, and sees their work go further than ever. We turn viewing into participation and open a new path for Thai cinema to move forward with everyone.
home_we_are_quote: This isn't just a platform. It's the start of a new chapter for Thai cinema. A chapter we write together.
home_creative_subtitle_1: is the space for stories just beginning
home_creative_desc_1: was not created to be just another platform in the film industry, but a space that gives ‚Äúideas‚Äù a place to stand since they were just a small spark.
home_creative_desc_2: We gather creators from diverse roles, from directors, writers, production teams, to audiences who want to participate in the story rather than just waiting for the final result.
eco_step_1_desc: User discovers project through trusted media channels.
eco_step_2_desc: In-depth education, project showcase, and risk analysis.
eco_step_3_desc: Licensed 3rd party portals (TH / InvestaX) handling the sale.
creators_desc: Visionary leaders driving innovation in film and blockchain technology.
feature_1_desc: Colestia supports the creativity of new filmmakers, gathering Thai film projects and giving everyone the opportunity to be part of filmmaking from the very first step.
feature_2_title: Supporting Creativity in the Thai Film Industry
feature_2_desc: Colestia believes creativity shouldn't be limited by old frameworks. We designed a space that encourages creators to dare to think, try, and tell stories in their own way, fostering tangible growth for these ideas.
feature_3_desc: Privileges and experiences designed specifically for Colestia supporters, covering everything from exclusive data access to platform-only activities and events.
feature_4_desc: Making support mean more than just being behind the scenes. Creators retain ownership of their work, while supporters can cleanly co-own the results, based on respect and transparency.
newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest news and updates from us
products_subtitle: Be part of creating quality film productions
coming_desc: Movie projects opening for funding soon. Subscribe to notifications to not miss investment opportunities.
no_results: No projects found in this category
desc_opportunity: This project represents a unique opportunity in the {category} space. By leveraging blockchain technology, {title} aims to solve key industry inefficiencies.
disclaimer_detail: Colestia provides this data for educational purposes only. Always conduct your own research.
modal_leaving_desc: You are about to visit {destination}, a third-party ICO portal.
modal_leaving_note: Please note: Colestia is an educational showcase only. We do not handle token sales, KYC, or investments directly.
partners_desc: Partners shaping the future of the media and blockchain technology industries.
admin_no_data: No data yet. Click "Seed Database" to add initial data.

contact_subtitle: Interested in film investment or collaboration? Send us your project details
contact_message_hint: Please provide as much project detail as possible
contact_privacy: Your information is confidential and will only be used to contact you
contact_success_message: Our team will contact you within 24-48 hours
contact_error: An error occurred. Please try again
about_mission_title: believes great films aren't built by just one person
about_mission_title_break: but grow from the collaboration of creators, supporters, and audiences
about_mission_desc: We believe in the power of co-creation and that meaningful stories deserve a space and chance to become reality.
about_slogan_en: There is always another way to think.
about_slogan_th: There is always another way to think.
about_origin_text: Colestia was born from a gathering of creators who believe in the power of cinema. We agree that creativity in the country has great potential but lacks a space that is open and conducive for those ideas to truly grow.
about_possibility_text: We serve as a central space gathering people, ideas, and possibilities of the Thai film industry, giving incomplete ideas a chance to start and grow with direction.
about_creator_desc: We support filmmakers with stories to tell, opening opportunities for ideas to be seen, supported, and systematically furthered from the first concept to actual film development.
about_creator_note: Changing one idea to go further than imagined
about_supporter_desc: Not just a support space, but an opportunity to participate in the creative process. Supporters can choose stories they believe in, follow growth, and be part of pushing Thai cinema to reality.
about_supporter_note: Co-creating an open and sustainable ecosystem
edu_intro: Colestia is committed to transparency. Before engaging with any project, it is crucial to understand the underlying token models and associated risks.
edu_token_utility_desc: Tokens that provide access to a product or service. They are not investments but rather keys to the ecosystem functionality.
edu_token_asset_desc: Tokens representing ownership or rights to physical or digital assets (e.g., Real Estate, Copyrights).
edu_risk_volatility_desc: Digital assets are highly volatile. You should never invest more than you can afford to lose.
edu_risk_reg_desc: The legal framework for digital assets is evolving and varies by jurisdiction.
edu_risk_tech_desc: Smart contracts and blockchain technology may have unforeseen vulnerabilities.
edu_risk_guarantee_desc: Past performance of a project is not indicative of future results.
edu_cta_text: Ready to explore vetted projects with this knowledge?

admin_no_txn: No transactions found matching your search.
admin_no_projects_desc: Try changing the filter or search query

desc_benefits: Investors receive exclusive NFTs, premiere invites, and revenue share tokens.
reward_nft_desc: Unique digital collectibles for every major project.
reward_tickets_desc: Be the first to see the movie in theaters.
reward_revenue_desc: Earn from the movie's success via digital tokens.
reward_meet_desc: Exclusive access to directors and cast.
how_to_step_1_desc: Browse through our curated list of Thai film projects. Use filters to find genres you love.
how_to_step_2_desc: Click 'Start' to see details. Follow the link to our licensed 3rd party portals for KYC and investment.
how_to_step_3_desc: Track your portfolio and get notified about progress. Receive exclusive rewards as the project grows.
auth_enter_credentials: Enter your credentials to access your account.
auth_login_image_desc: Join the community where filmmakers and investors unite to bring visionary stories to life.
auth_start_quote: "Every great story begins with a single step. Join us to be part of the next masterpiece."
auth_join_revolution: Join the revolution of decentralized film financing.
msg_password_length_error: Password must be at least 6 characters
msg_agree_terms_error: Please agree to Terms and Conditions
desc_our_services: Colestia is more than just a crowdfunding platform. We offer a comprehensive ecosystem designed to empower filmmakers and protect investors.
service_1_desc: Connecting filmmakers with a global network of investors through our secure and transparent production-funding platform.
service_2_desc: End-to-end production assistance, from pre-production planning to post-production coordination.
service_3_desc: Strategic partnerships with streaming platforms and theater chains to ensure your content reaches the widest audience.
service_4_desc: Representing and managing contracts for actors, directors, and key creative personnel.
service_5_desc: Rental services for high-end camera gear, lighting, and sound stages for productions of any scale.
service_6_desc: Legal and commercial support for licensing movie rights, merchandise, and adaptations.
page_education_subtitle: Curated guides and insights on film industry, investment, and technology.
edu_risk_desc: Investing in digital assets and films involves high risks. You may lose the entire investment amount. Please study the information carefully before investing.
auth_forgot_desc: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
auth_check_email_desc: We have sent a password reset link to
auth_resend_link: Didn't receive the email? Click to resend

terms_1_content: By accessing our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site or using any other services provided by Colestia.
terms_2_content: Other than the content you own, under these Terms, Colestia and/or its licensors own all the intellectual property rights and materials contained in this Website. You are granted limited license only for purposes of viewing the material contained on this Website.
terms_3_content_intro: You are specifically restricted from all of the following:
terms_3_list_1: Publishing any Website material in any other media;
terms_3_list_2: Selling, sublicensing and/or otherwise commercializing any Website material;
terms_3_list_3: Publicly performing and/or showing any Website material;
terms_3_list_4: Using this Website in any way that is or may be damaging to this Website;
terms_3_list_5: Using this Website in any way that impacts user access to this Website;
terms_4_content: In no event shall Colestia, nor any of its officers, directors and employees, be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this Website whether such liability is under contract. Colestia, including its officers, directors and employees shall not be held liable for any indirect, consequential or special liability arising out of or in any way related to your use of this Website.
terms_5_content: These Terms will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Kingdom of Thailand, and you submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in Thailand for the resolution of any disputes.
privacy_1_content: Welcome to Colestia. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy_2_content_intro: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows:
privacy_2_list_1: Identity Data: includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.
privacy_2_list_2: Contact Data: includes email address and telephone numbers.
privacy_2_list_3: Technical Data: includes internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting and location.
privacy_2_list_4: Usage Data: includes information about how you use our website and services.
privacy_3_content_intro: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
privacy_3_list_1: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you.
privacy_3_list_2: Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.
privacy_3_list_3: Where we need to comply with a legal or regulatory obligation.
privacy_4_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.
privacy_5_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

news_subtitle: Latest stories, announcements, and insights from the Colestia team.
reward_redeem_title: Ready to Redeem. Ready to use
reward_redeem_desc: Choose how your digital assets translate into real experiences.
get_started_title: Start Your Investment
get_started_subtitle: Follow these simple steps to become a part of the Colestia film revolution.
step_1_desc: Understand investment basics and register your wallet via Privy/Flips to get your address instantly.
step_2_desc: Paste your wallet address into the 'Wallet Address' field on the ICO Portal and complete your identity verification (KYC).
step_2_card_desc: Paste address in your ICO Portal profile.
step_3_desc: Purchase tokens using the Base Network (must match your wallet network) for fast and correct transactions.
step_3_hint: Must use Base Network for transactions.
step_4_desc: Once done, you are a co-creator of Thai cinema! Wait for exclusive perks and follow the project progress.
